title: Campaigners defend bid to save ancient oak as homeowners speak out in support
description: Homeowners in Clifton Terrace told the Gazette about their concerns about the King George oak being chopped.

title: Ancient rainforest perfect for a winter walk just a short drive from Devon
description: Visitors have expressed their surprise at discovering a 'magical woodland' in England, while others are amazed it has remained a ‘secret’ from some poeple for so long

title: North East landmark to reveal ancient prison cell on Secret Spaces Tour
description: A rare opportunity to see inside historic cell for surprising inmates

title: "Excitement" as The Fossil Thief confirms it is a permanent Gunwharf fixture following a "crazy few months"
description: After a “crazy few months” an independent cafe and bar has confirmed it will be a permanent fixture at Gunwharf Quays following a temporary contract.

title: Tiny bump on 7 million-year-old fossil suggests ancient ape walked upright — and might even be a human ancestor
description: The way Sahelanthropus tchadensis moved has long been debated. The discovery of a small bump on the front of the thigh bone is "beyond convincing" evidence this ape was bipedal.
